description.p: This suit of armor is reinforced with a magically enhanced metal alloy called duerinium, which is made in Duergar foundries deep in the under rifts. While you're wearing the armor, any critical hit against you becomes a normal hit. In addition, when you are subjected to a magical effect that allows you to make a Strength or Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw.

set.name: type
set.addition: medium or heavy, but not hide

description.p: While holding this shield, you have advantage on initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks.

Bjørnvakt was a gift to an elven ambassador, the shield would protect the elf from would be assassins. Furthermore it would give them access to the intricacies of the dwarven language to stimulate better relations between the dwarven and elven peoples.
It provides the following bennefits while it is on your person:

ul.li: You can speak and understand the dwarven language and it's dialects.
Bjørnvakt, shield of Malmfjall can't be broken. Special means must be used to destroy it.
